DESCRIPTION: Place in a bubble, which pops and returns the bubbled card to hand if you take unblocked attack damage.
Adds a number of cards to hand, starting from the rightmost bubble, then from the bottom of the draw pile if no bubbles remain.
Adjusts your Flood level based on the direction of the current.
Submerged enemies gain increasing levels of #yDrown each turn, which causes them to lose HP at the end of their turn.
Drowning enemies lose HP at the end of their turn if Submerged, otherwise they lose half their Drown.
